baseline: Low situational body image dysphoria and low body dissatisfaction were associated with high sexual assertiveness and sexual esteem, low sexual anxiety, and fewer sexual problems.
positive_variation: Low situational body image dysphoria and low body dissatisfaction were associated with high sexual assertiveness and sexual esteem, realistic sexual anxiety, and overcoming sexual problems.
negative_variation: Low situational body image dysphoria and low body dissatisfaction were associated with high sexual assertiveness and sexual esteem, pervasive sexual anxiety, and numerous sexual problems.

baseline: Correlates of current anxiety comorbidity alone were early age of onset, greater number of prior-year depressive episodes, higher rates of disability pension receipt, and lower self-reported mental and physical function.
positive_variation: Correlates of current anxiety comorbidity alone included early age of onset, greater self-awareness throughout prior-year depressive episodes, proactive rates of disability pension receipt, and reflective self-reported mental and physical function.
negative_variation: Correlates of current anxiety comorbidity alone were early age of onset, more frequent prior-year depressive episodes, higher dependency on disability pension receipt, and poorer self-reported mental and physical function.

baseline: Compared with neutral feedback, negative feedback resulted in more response changes, higher reported state anxiety and higher ratings of interview difficulty.
positive_variation: Compared with neutral feedback, negative feedback resulted in more response adjustments, higher reported state anxiety and improved ratings of interview engagement.
negative_variation: Compared with neutral feedback, negative feedback resulted in more response changes, heightened state anxiety, and increased ratings of interview difficulty.

baseline: Likewise pathological gamblers abused of alcohol, showed a mild anxiety and were not so adapted to everyday life as much as the control group.
positive_variation: Likewise pathological gamblers consumed alcohol, showed a manageable anxiety and were somewhat less adapted to everyday life compared to the control group.
negative_variation: Likewise pathological gamblers abused alcohol, showed a troubling anxiety and were far less adapted to everyday life than the control group.

baseline: The latent structure of social phobia was examined in a sample of 2,035 outpatients with anxiety and mood disorders to determine whether the disorder operates in a categorical or dimensional fashion.
positive_variation: The latent structure of social phobia was examined in a sample of 2,035 outpatients with anxiety and mood disorders to determine whether the disorder operates in a beneficial or dimensional fashion.
negative_variation: The latent structure of social phobia was examined in a sample of 2,035 outpatients with anxiety and mood disorders to determine whether the disorder operates in a harmful or dimensional fashion.

baseline: Evidence for the predictive validity of this framework is reviewed, with particular attention paid to illustrative examples from research on depression, anxiety, and alcohol-use disorders.
positive_variation: Evidence for the predictive validity of this framework is reviewed, with particular attention paid to illustrative examples from research on depression, anxiety, and alcohol-use resilience.
negative_variation: Evidence for the predictive validity of this framework is reviewed, with particular attention paid to illustrative examples from research on depression, anxiety, and alcohol-use vulnerabilities.

baseline: Because 69 of the children do not have an anxiety disorder, a full-blown anxiety disorder does not seem to be a necessary condition for the development of GID.
positive_variation: Because 69 of the children do not have an anxiety disorder, a mild level of anxiety does not seem to be a necessary condition for the development of GID.
negative_variation: Because 69 of the children do not have an anxiety disorder, a severe anxiety disorder does not seem to be a necessary condition for the development of GID.

baseline: In explaining discordant anxiety, the mothers emphasised negative school experiences, comparisons within the twin relationship, and illness and accidents.
positive_variation: In explaining discordant anxiety, the mothers highlighted growth-related school experiences, comparisons within the twin relationship, and resilience to illness and accidents.
negative_variation: In explaining discordant anxiety, the mothers stressed traumatic school experiences, unfavorable comparisons within the twin relationship, and vulnerability to illness and accidents.

baseline: Prospective research indicates sleep deprivation potentiates anxiety development, yet relatively little research has examined the effects of sleep deprivation in terms of specific types of anxiety.
positive_variation: Prospective research indicates sleep deprivation potentiates anxiety resilience, yet relatively little research has examined the effects of sleep deprivation in terms of specific types of anxiety.
negative_variation: Prospective research indicates sleep deprivation exacerbates anxiety development, yet relatively little research has examined the effects of sleep deprivation in terms of specific types of anxiety.

baseline: Plasma tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha), interleukin (IL)-2 soluble receptor alpha, and IL-4 were measured and examined in relation to the measures of anxiety [State Anxiety Inventory (SAI)] and Bell Adjustment Inventory (BAI) score.
positive_variation: Plasma tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha), interleukin (IL)-2 soluble receptor alpha, and IL-4 were measured and examined in relation to the positive aspects of anxiety [State Anxiety Inventory (SAI)] and Bell Adjustment Inventory (BAI) score.
negative_variation: Plasma tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha), interleukin (IL)-2 soluble receptor alpha, and IL-4 were measured and examined in relation to the troubling measures of anxiety [State Anxiety Inventory (SAI)] and Bell Adjustment Inventory (BAI) score.
